item.description:
At this first session of our secular study group series, organizers Mike, Alex, and Camilo have decided to examine Bertrand Russell's essay, "Why I Am Not A Christian." The three organizers will moderate a discussion, going through the text in a succinct point-by-point presentation before opening the floor to general discussion. Members interested in attending can find the short text at the Files section of the Meetup site.

After the discussion group, members will be free to depart or join an expedition to Flattop Johnny's in Kendall Square.
item.how_to_find_us: I live there. If you can't find me there, there are bigger issues to worry you.
item.name: Secular Study Group: "Why I Am Not A Christian"
